page.title: 06SCHOOL IN SKELMORLIE
page.content: In January 1976 the doors shut on Skelmorlie's first school,a red sand- stone Victorian building opened in September 1876 by Professor Thomson, and new doors were opened on a modern bright building. The school is a primary school for children of all denominations.Most children are Christian,either Protest- ant or Catholic and at present we have one pupil who is a Hindu. Children begin school between the ages of 4 and 5 and stay in Primary School for 7 years.There are 7 classes formed on an age basis.The biggest class,P2,has 33 pupils and the small- est class,P6,has 15 pupils,all of them girls. At present there are 158 pupils,6 full-time teachers,1 part-time teacher 1 headmaster and visiting teachers for Music,P.E. and Home Economics.
